buffInfo.toggles: <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/mage/magic-guard.png} tip={Magic Guard (1st Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bishop/teleport-mastery.png} tip={Teleport Mastery (3rd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bishop/teleport-boost.png} tip={Teleport Boost (3rd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bishop/righteously-indignant.png} tip={Righteously Indignant (Hyper Skill)}>(Mode Switch) <tt src={/class-icons/5th-job/mana-overload.png} tip={Mana Overload (5th Job)}>(30s cd)

buffInfo.damageReduce: <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bishop/holy-magic-shell.png} tip={Holy Magic Shell (3rd Job)} dur={[15s/15 hits](-10% | 90s cd)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bishop/divine-punishment.png} tip={Divine Punishment (5th Job)} dur={[While casting](-50% | 1.5s cd, 11s recharge - up to 5 charges)}>

linkSkill.name: Empirical Knowledge
linkSkill.shortDesc: When attacking, has a 31% chance to identify the weakness of the enemy with the highest Max HP among those struck, granting you the following bonuses against them:\nDamage per Stack: +5%, Enemy DEF Ignored per Stack: +5%\nEffect Duration: 10 sec, Stacks up to 3 times
linkSkill.desc: Successful attacks have a chance to debuff against the enemy with the highest Max HP
details: [Debuff]: Increases %Damage and %Ignore DEF against this enemy (stacks up to 3 times)
Can be stacked up to 3 times, once for each unique Explorer Magician to reach Master Level

info: To create one, choose the 'Explorers' option in the Character Creation screen and then continue through the story until you reach the town Lith Harbor where Sugar has a quest called 'The Adventure Begins'. Accept the quest and choose the option 'Magician' when prompted

Continue with the story until Lv. 30 as a Magician and talk to Grendel the Really Old to accept a quest called 'The 3 Arcane Paths'. Complete the quest by choosing the option Cleric and you will be on the path to a Bishop. Cleric is the 2nd job of Bishop

build: <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/mage/mana-wave.png} tip={Mana Wave}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/mage/teleport.png} tip={Teleport}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/mage/magic-guard.png} tip={Magic Guard}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/mage/mp-boost.png} tip={MP Boost}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/mage/magic-armor.png} tip={Magic Armor}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/mage/energy-bolt.png} tip={Energy Bolt}>

<tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bishop/spell-mastery.png} tip={Spell Mastery}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/common/high-wisdom.png} tip={High Wisdom}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bishop/agile-magic.png} tip={Agile Magic}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bishop/invincible.png} tip={Invincible}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bishop/mp-eater.png} tip={MP Eater}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bishop/bless.png} tip={Bless}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bishop/heal.png} tip={Heal/Angelic Wrath}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bishop/holy-arrow.png} tip={Holy Arrow}>

<tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bishop/teleport-boost.png} tip={Teleport Boost}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bishop/holy-focus.png} tip={Holy Focus}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bishop/arcane-overdrive.png} tip={Arcane Overdrive}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bishop/teleport-mastery.png} tip={Teleport Mastery}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bishop/holy-symbol.png} tip={Holy Symbol}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bishop/holy-fountain.png} tip={Holy Fountain/Fountain of Vengeance}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bishop/mystic-door.png} tip={Mystic Door}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bishop/dispel.png} tip={Dispel/Triumph Feather}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bishop/shining-ray.png} tip={Shining Ray}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bishop/divine-protection.png} tip={Divine Protection}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bishop/holy-magic-shell.png} tip={Holy Magic Shell}>

<tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bishop/buff-mastery.png} tip={Buff Mastery}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bishop/advanced-blessing.png} tip={Advanced Blessing}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bishop/big-bang.png} tip={Big Bang}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bishop/bahamut.png} tip={Bahamut}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bishop/arcane-aim.png} tip={Arcane Aim}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bishop/holy-water.png} tip={Holy Water/Blood of the Divine}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/common/maple-warrior.png} tip={Maple Warrior}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bishop/infinity.png} tip={Infinity}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bishop/angel-ray.png} tip={Angel Ray}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bishop/genesis.png} tip={Genesis}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bishop/resurrection.png} tip={Resurrection}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/common/heros-will.png} tip={Hero's Will}>
details: All 1st to 4th Job skills can be maxed
Put one SP into each skill first and then max each skill in this order
For any skills that have prerequisites, follow them first before following build path

hyperBuild.recommended: <bp_<tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bishop/holy-symbol-item-drop.png} tip={Holy Symbol - Item Drop}> Holy Symbol - Item Drop_<tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bishop/advanced-blessing-ferocity.png} tip={Advanced Blessing - Ferocity}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bishop/advanced-blessing-boss-rush.png} tip={Advanced Blessing - Boss Rush}> Advanced Blessing - Ferocity and Boss Rush_<tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bishop/holy-magic-shell-enhance.png} tip={Holy Magic Shell - Enhance}> Holy Magic Shell - Enhance OR <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bishop/holy-magic-shell-enhance.png} tip={Holy Magic Shell - Enhance}> Holy Magic Shell - Persist_<tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bishop/holy-symbol-preparation.png} tip={Holy Symbol - Preparation}> Holy Symbol - Preparation OR <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bishop/holy-symbol-experience.png} tip={Holy Symbol - Experience}> Holy Symbol - Experience_>

nodes: <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bishop/big-bang.png} tip={Big Bang (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bishop/angel-ray.png} tip={Angel Ray (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bishop/bahamut.png} tip={Bahamut (4th Job)}>

<tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bishop/heavens-door.png} tip={Heaven's Door/Fountain of Vengeance (Hyper Skill/3rd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bishop/genesis.png} tip={Genesis/Triumph Feather (4th/3rd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bishop/heal.png} tip={Heal/Angelic Wrath (2nd Job)}>
notes: Any combination of these skills are good but preferred from same category as you want to max primary first
4 Boost Nodes total are needed to reach Master Level 60 for these skills (with Matrix Points used)<bp_Nodes with the same Main Skill (skill at the top) cannot be equipped at the same time_>

possible.nodes: <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bishop/heal.png} tip={Heal/Angelic Wrath (2nd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bishop/holy-arrow.png} tip={Holy Arrow (2nd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bishop/shining-ray.png} tip={Shining Ray (3rd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bishop/big-bang.png} tip={Big Bang (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bishop/bahamut.png} tip={Bahamut (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bishop/angel-ray.png} tip={Angel Ray (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bishop/genesis.png} tip={Genesis/Triumph Feather (4th/3rd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bishop/heavens-door.png} tip={Heaven's Door/Fountain of Vengeance (Hyper Skill/3rd Job)}>

content.specialThanks: Special thanks to bel and the members of the Explorer Mage Discord for their help in making this overview!
credits: Inner Ability + Hyper Passive Build + Boost Nodes Build

extraContent.title: Benevolence and Vengeance
content: At Lv. 140, you unlock the Hyper Skill, <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bishop/righteously-indignant.png} tip={Righteously Indignant (Hyper Skill)}> Righteously Indignant that allows you to swap between Benevolence skills and Venegeance skills

Benevolence skills provide supportive abilities like party heals and utility while Venegeance skills provide offensive abilities like attacks and self-buffs. Benevolence and Venegeance skills share the same Key Slot and Skill Points (SP)
Below are a list of all Benevolence and Venegeance skills:

<bp_<tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bishop/heal.png} tip={Heal (2nd Job)}> / <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bishop/angelic-wrath.png} tip={Angelic Wrath (2nd Job)}> Heal & Angelic Wrath (2nd Job)_<tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bishop/holy-fountain.png} tip={Holy Fountain (3rd Job)}> / <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bishop/fountain-of-vengeance.png} tip={Fountain of Venegeance (3rd Job)}> Holy Fountain & Fountain of Venegeance (3rd Job)_<tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bishop/dispel.png} tip={Dispel (3rd Job)}> / <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bishop/triumph-feather.png} tip={Triumph Feather (3rd Job)}> Dispel & Triumph Feather (3rd Job)_<tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bishop/holy-water.png} tip={Holy Water (4th Job)}> / <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bishop/blood-of-the-divine.png} tip={Blood of the Divine (4th Job)}> Holy Water & Blood of the Divine (4th Job)_>

primary.name: Three Snails
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 7, Damage 40
primary.desc: Throws a snail shell forward that deals fixed amount of damage

primary.name: Recovery
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 15, Recover 72 HP over 30 sec

primary.name: Nimble Feet
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 10, Duration 12, Movement Speed: 20

primary.name: Maple Return
primary.shortDesc: Returns you to Southperry Harbor on Maple Island.\nCooldown: 600 sec

primary.name: Hero's Echo
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, increases Attack Power & Magic ATT by 4% for 2400 sec\nCooldown: 300 sec
details: To obtain this skill, complete the quest <link href={https://maplestorywiki.net/w/Quests/77/An_Arrangement_from_the_Goddess%2E} title={"An Arrangement from the Goddess"}>
Affects all nearby players

primary.name: Energy Bolt
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 24, Damage: 78%, Number of Attacks: 4 Max Enemies Hit: 4
primary.desc: Casts an explosive orb forward

primary.name: Magic Guard
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 13, Damage Displaced: 85% of your MP, Duration: While the skill is activated
primary.desc: When toggled, a portion of your damage taken will be redirected towards your MP
details: Excludes attacks that deal %Max HP damage
Will not work if you have 0 MP

primary.name: Teleport
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 20, Teleport to the left and right with 190, and up and down with 295\n[Passive Effects: Speed: +22, Max Speed: +20]
primary.desc: Teleports you in the direction you are moving in with your Arrow Keys
details: Can be used in the air and on ladders

primary.name: Mana Wave
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 10. Allows you to jump a greater distance.\nHold the Jump key after using to spend 20 MP to descent slowly for up to 5 sec.
primary.desc: Up jump skill
details: Can be assigned a Key Slot or activated by pressing the Up Arrow Key and Jump Key while in the air
After using, holding the Jump Key will allow you to slowly float down<bp_You can move while floating_>

primary.name: Magic Armor
primary.shortDesc: Defense: +90

primary.name: MP Boost
primary.shortDesc: Max MP: +20%, Attack Speed: +1, MP increases by 120 per level\nCritical Rate: +5% when equipped with a Wand

primary.name: Holy Arrow
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 36, Damage: 185%, Number of Attacks: 3, Max Enemies Hit: 4
primary.desc: Fire a blast of holy arrows forward
details: Deals increased damage to Undead and Devil type monsters

primary.name: Blessed Ensemble
primary.shortDesc: Including yourself, increases final damage by 1% in proportion to the number of nearby party members you have buffed. 20% bonus EXP fo each Cleric in the party.
primary.desc: Increases your %Final Damage for every nearby party member you have buffed
details: Grants increased %EXP from enemies for each Cleric in your party (up to 60%)

primary.name: Heal
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 24, Recovery: 300%, Heal's Cooldown per Party Member Healed: -2 sec\nCooldown: 4 sec.
primary.desc: Heals nearby party members
details: Cooldown is reduced based on the number of members in your party
Deals damage to Undead type monsters

primary.name: Angelic Wrath
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 24, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Damage: 350%, Number of Attacks: 5.\nEnemies stuck have their Defense reduced by 44% for 60 sec.
primary.desc: Call an angel to strike forward and debuff enemies hit
details: [Debuff]: Reduces %DEF<bp_Reduction to %DEF can be considered as %Ignore DEF_>

primary.name: Bless
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 20, Attack Power: +15, Magic ATT: +15, DEF: +300, Duration: 240 sec

primary.name: Agile Magic
primary.shortDesc: Attack Speed: +2, INT: +20

primary.name: Invincible
primary.shortDesc: Damage Taken: -25%

primary.name: Spell Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Magic Mastery: 50%, Magic ATT: +10

primary.name: High Wisdom
primary.shortDesc: Permanently increase INT by 40

primary.name: MP Eater
primary.shortDesc: MP Absorb Chance: 20%, Amount Absorbed: 10% of Max MP\nAmount Absorbed: 5% of the boss's Max MP
primary.desc: Your attacks have a chance to steal a portion of the enemy's %Max HP
details: Effectiveness is reduced for bosses

primary.name: Shining Ray
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 45, Damage: 254%, Number of Attacks: 4, Max Monsters Hit: 6, Stun Chance: 60%, Stun Duration: 5 sec
primary.desc: Shines a ray of light that damages nearby enemies and has a chance to stun
details: Deals increased damage to Undead and Devil type monsters

primary.name: Holy Fountain
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 40, Duration: 60 sec, restores 40% HP when used, able to use 20 times total.\nCooldown: 60 sec
primary.desc: Place down a fountain that party members can press the Up Arrow Key to restore some %Max HP
details: Has a fixed number of uses before the fountain disappears
Cannot be placed when there is another fountain active (Bishop, Decent, or 5th Job variants)
Unaffected by cooldown resets and %Buff Duration

primary.name: Fountain of Vengeance
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 40, Duration: 60 sec.\nPeriodically deals 180% damage 5 times to up to 8 enemies.
primary.desc: Place down a stationary fountain that periodically damages nearby enemies

primary.name: Divine Protection
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 80, Number of Debilitating Status Condition Resistances: 5\nCooldown: 80 sec\n[Passive Effect: Increases Abnormal Status and all Elemental Resistance by 40]
primary.desc: Creates a barrier that blocks up to 5 Critical Abnormal Statuses
details: [Passive]: Permanently increases Abnormal Status Resistance and %Elemental Resistance
Cooldown is reduced for each party member cured by <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bishop/dispel.png} tip={Dispel (3rd Job)}>

primary.name: Mystic Door
primary.shortDesc: MP 60, Portal Duration: 200 sec
primary.desc: Place down a portal that leads to the nearest town for your party members
details: To use, press the Up Arrow Key

primary.name: Dispel
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 10, after nullifying magic and curing Abnormal Status at 100% chance, Dispel's cooldown reduced by 4 sec and Divine Protection's cooldown reduced by 6 sec for each party member cured\nCooldown: 8 sec
primary.desc: Cures party members of Abnormal Statuses
details: If a party member is cured, the cooldown of Dispel and <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bishop/divine-protection.png} tip={Divine Protection (3rd Job)}> are reduced
Right-clicking the skill will toggle ON/OFF skill effect transparency to party members' debuffs

primary.name: Triumph Feather
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 150, Duration: 120 sec. Upon striking an enemy with an attack skill, creates 4 angel feathers every 4 sec that seek enemies and deal 230% damage 4 times.\nAngel Feather Cooldown: 3 sec\nCooldown: 60 sec.
primary.desc: While active, periodically, successful attacks create feathers that seek out and attack enemies

primary.name: Holy Symbol
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 300, EXP Bonus: 50%, Duration: 240 sec
primary.desc: Increases the amount of EXP gained from enemies for all party members nearby
details: If party members go too far, the effects of Holy Symbol are reduced

primary.name: Teleport Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Additional MP Cost: 20, Max Monsters Hit: 6, Damage: 340%, Stun Chance: 80%, Stun Duration: 4 sec.\n[Passive Effect: Knockback Resistance: +40%]
primary.desc: While toggled, using <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/mage/teleport.png} tip={Teleport (1st Job)}> will damage nearby enemies
details: [Passive]: Permanently increases %Knockback Resistance
Has a chance to stun enemies

primary.name: Teleport Boost
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 20, Teleport Distance: Horizontal +65, Vertical +25.
primary.desc: While toggled, increases the teleport distance of <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/mage/teleport.png} tip={Teleport (1st Job)}>

primary.name: Holy Magic Shell
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 70, HP Recovered: 50% of max HP, Duration: 15 sec, Max Number of Attacks Blocked: 15, Damage: -10% for attacks that do a certain percentage of your Max HP.\nCannot trigger Holy Magic for 80 sec Cooldown: 90 sec.
primary.desc: Restores %Max HP to nearby party members and grants them a shield
details: The shield will absorb a set number of attacks before disappearing<bp_If the attack was a %Max HP attack, you will take reduced damage instead_>
After receiving a Holy Magic Shell, you may not receive another one for a short amount of time

primary.name: Arcane Overdrive
primary.shortDesc: Critical Rate: +30%, Critical Damage: +16%

primary.name: Holy Focus
primary.shortDesc: For all attacks and the Heal skill, Critical Rate: +40%, Magic Mastery: +70%

primary.name: Angel Ray
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 56, Max Enemies Hit: 1, Damage: 225%, Number of Attacks: 14. Restores 10% of your Max HP for you and your party members.
primary.desc: Fire a holy sword forward that damages a single enemy
details: Heals party members that holy sword passes through including those affected by the 'Undead' debuff

primary.name: Genesis
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 300, Damage: 324%, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Number of Attacks: 10, Crit Rate: +20%,\nCooldown: 30 sec
primary.desc: Unleash rays of holy light that damage a large area
details: Attack has increased %Crit Rate

primary.name: Big Bang
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 50, Damage: 480%, Number of Attacks: 4, Max Enemies Hit: 10\nDamage Against Normal Enemies: +50%
primary.desc: Release a burst of holy explosions damaging multiple enemies
details: Deals increased %Damage to regular monsters

primary.name: Blessed Harmony
primary.shortDesc: Final Damage: +4%, Final Damage: +2% for each nearby party members under the effect of your buffs.
details: Increases %Final Damage provided per stack
Now grants flat %Final Damage

primary.name: Holy Water
primary.shortDesc:
Passive Effect: Hitting enemies 7 times with Angel Ray generates 1 Holy Water. You can carry up to 5 Holy Water at one time.
Active Effect: MP Cost: 100. Requires at least 1 Holy Water. Consume all Holy Water in your possession to summon chalices of Holy Water nearby. If there is not enough space, only some of the chalices will be summoned.
Chalice Duration: 5 sec, +5 sec per 2500 INT you possess. Party members recover 5% of HP upon using the Holy Water. Their HP Recovery is increased by 5% per 2500 INT you possess (this bonus is additive).
If the Holy Water disappears even though the duration remains, you get as much as 50% of Holy Water as the number of Holy Water that disappeared.
Cooldown 10 sec
details: [Passive]: Successfully landing <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bishop/angel-ray.png} tip={Angel Ray (4th Job}> 7 times will generate 1 Holy Water (up to 5)

[Active]: Consumes all Holy Water to summon chalices you and your party members can consume to heal<bp_Press the Up Arrow Key while standing on top of a chalice to heal_The duration and amount healed per chalice is increased (additively) based on your INT stat, +5 sec & +5% recovery for every 2500 INT_If the active ends early, up to 50% of Holy Water is returned_>

primary.name: Blood of the Divine
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 300, Damage Taken: +15% for 10 sec., HP Recovery: -99% (excludes healing items), Final Damage: +15%\nCooldown: 120 sec.
primary.desc: Increases %Final Damage however, also increases %Damage Taken and reduces HP recovery (excluding healing items)
details: While active, pressing the Skill Key will cancel the buff

primary.name: Resurrection
primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 150. Revives all KO'd party members within range and makes them invincible for 8 sec.
When revived by Resurrection on a map that has a death count, the party member who revived with Bishop will have 5% increased damage for 30 sec. The damage increase will grow by 1% greater for every 2500 points of INT, up to a maximum of 25%.
This increase doesn't count INT granted by Special Skill Rings.
Cooldown: 300 sec.
primary.desc: Revives all party members within range
details: Revived party members are briefly invincible and gain increased %Damage<bp_Increases amount of %Damage provided based on your INT stat, +1% for every 2500 INT (up to +25%)_Scaling does not include INT granted by Special Skill Rings._>
Consumes a Death Count for bosses
Unaffected by cooldown resets

primary.name: Infinity
primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 80, Duration: 40 sec. Periodically restores your base HP and MP by 10%.
Increases Final Damage by 70% during the buff. Periodically increases Final Damage by 3%, can increased up to 115%, Final Damage increased by Infinity is additive.
Mana swirls around the character when 30% remains of the final buff duration (accounting for the duration-enhancing effects).
Cooldown: 180 sec.
primary.desc: When active, your skills do not consume mana and you gain increased %Final Damage
details: Additionally while active, continuously increases %Final Damage (additively) and periodically restores %Max HP/MP
When the buff is close to expiring, a visual effect will appear around your character
Unaffected by cooldown resets

primary.name: Bahamut
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 120, Bahamut Summon Duration: 260 sec\nDamage: 170%, Number of Attacks: 3, Max Enemies Hit: 3
primary.desc: Summons a dragon that attacks nearby enemies
details: Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Advanced Blessing
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 52, Attack Power: +30, Magic ATT: +30, DEF: +550, Max HP: +750, Max MP: +750, MP Consumption: -20%, Duration: 240 sec
details: Does not stack with <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bishop/bless.png} tip={Bless (2nd Job)}>

primary.name: Maple Warrior
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 70, Goddess of Maple World appears\n[Passive Effect: All stats with a direct AP investment increase by 15%]
details: Skill is a passive, the active effect does nothing except displays an animation

primary.name: Hero's Will
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Cooldown: 300 sec
primary.desc: Removes certain abnormal status effects and become immune to Abnormal Status for 3 secs
details: Unaffected by <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/paladin/combat-orders.png} tip={Temporarily increases all of your skill levels. Only 4th Job Skills can be increased beyond master level while other skills can only be increased to master level. Exceptions: Some special skills, beginner skills, Combat Orders, hyper skills, 5th job skills, and 6th job skills cannot be increased.}/> Combat Orders

primary.name: Buff Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Permanently increased Magic ATT: +30, Final Damage: +11%, Buff Duration: +50%, Knockback Resistance: +60%

primary.name: Arcane Aim
primary.shortDesc: Ignores 20% of enemy DEF. Successful attacks have a 100% chance to increase your damage by 8% for 5 sec (excludes minion damage).\nThis effect stacks up to 5 times.
primary.desc: Successfully damaging an enemy grants a stacking %Damage buff (up to 5 times)
details: Summon attacks cannot trigger this effect
Additionally increases %Ignore DEF

hyperPassive.name: Holy Magic Shell - Enhance
details: Includes %Max HP attacks

hyperPassive.name: Holy Symbol - Preparation
hyperPassive.shortDesc: Abnormal Status Resistance and Elemental Resistance: +10%\n[Passive Effects - Abnormal Status Resistance: +10, Elemental Resistance: +10%]

hyperActive.name: Righteously Indignant
hyperActive.shortDesc: Convert Heal, Dispel, Holy Fountain, and Holy Water to Angelic Wrath, Triumph Feather, Fountain of Vengeance, and Blood of the Divine.\nCooldown: 0.5 sec\n[Passive Effects] Magic ATT: +50, Final Damage: +30%, Ignore Defense: +20%, Enemy Elemental Resistance: -10%
hyperActive.desc: Switches between Benevolence skills and Vengeance skills
details: [Passive]: Permanently increases %Final Damage, %Ignore DEF, %Elemental Resistance, and grants Magic Attack

hyperActive.name: Heaven's Door
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 500, Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 670%, Number of Attacks: 8, Protects party members from one KO.\nCooldown: 60 sec\nParty members that receive Heaven's Door cannot receive it again for 600 sec.
hyperActive.desc: Damages nearby enemies while granting a buff to nearby party members
details: [Buff]: Protects allies from one KO
After receiving a Heaven's Door's buff, you may not receive another one for a short amount of time

hyperActive.name: Epic Adventure
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 100, Duration: 60 sec, Damage: +10%\nApplies to any Explorer class in the party\nCooldown: 120 sec.

fifthMain.name: Benediction
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1000, Duration: 40 sec, Final Damage: +33% in the zone
Party members other than yourself periodically recover 1% of max HP/MP, clear certain statuses, and have their Attack Speed increased.
Party Final Damage: +1% per 3000 INT, based on the number of party members (min: 6%, max: 33%).
HP/MP Recovery: +1% per 2000 INT (up to +10% max)
Attack Speed: +1 per 10000 INT (up to +3 max)
These increases don't count INT granted by Special Skill Rings.
Cooldown: 120 sec
fifthMain.desc: Create an aura around your character that increases %Final Damage for all party members within and grants a buff
details: [Buff]: Party members other than yourself gain Attack Speed while periodically restoring %Max HP/MP and clearing certain Abnormal Statuses
The amount of %Final Damage provided is divided among nearby party members

Effects scale off of your INT stat:<bp_[Final Damage]: +1% for every 3000 INT (up to +33%, divided between party members)_[HP/MP Recovery]: +1% for every 2000 INT (up to +10%)_[Attack Speed]: +1% for every 10000 INT (up to +3)_Scaling unaffected by Special Skill Rings_>

fifthMain.name: Angel of Balance
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1000, Summon Duration: 30 sec
Angel of Benevolence: Grants a buff that recovers 16% of party members' Max HP every 5 sec. For 4 sec., increases your damage by 100% and party member damage by 5% plus 1% per 1250 INT up to 40%.
This increase doesn't count INT granted by Special Skill Rings.
Avenging Angel: Attacks up to 12 enemies dealing 1100% damage 10 times. Attacked enemies are marked for 60 sec. Holy damage dealt to marked enemies by you and party members consumes the mark and grants the attack Final Damage: +10%.
Cooldown: 120 sec.
fifthMain.desc: Summon two angels that attack nearby enemies and buff party members
details: [Angel of Vengeance]: Grants a buff to nearby party members that periodically restores %Max HP and increases their %Damage<bp_Damage increase scales off of your INT stat, +1% for every 1250 INT (up to +40%)_Scaling unaffected by Special Skill Rings_>
[Avenging Angel]: Attacks nearby enemies and applies a debuff where Holy-attribute attacks deal increased %Final Damage and consume the debuff
Upon summoning, <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bishop/bahamut.png} tip={Bahamut (4th Job)}> Bahamut will despawn and then respawn once the summon expires
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

fifthMain.name: Peacemaker
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 350, deals 770% damage to up to 6 enemies 4 time(s) at every interval, or restores 45% of the Bishop's max HP for you and your party members that come into contact with the object.
Max Contact Count: 6. Only recovery consumes the contact count.
Holy Light: Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 770%, Number of Attacks: 12. The Bishop and party members that come into contact with the light will gain a buff that increases damage by 23% for 12 sec.
Cooldown: 10 sec.
fifthMain.desc: Send an angel forward that damages enemies and heals party members it passes through
details: At the end of its range or when the Skill Key is pressed again, the angel expands dealing damage and buffing party members<bp_[Buff]: Increases %Damage_>
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

fifthMain.name: Divine Punishment
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost per Attack: 40, Consumes 1 holy light per sec.
Attacks up to 6 enemies to the front, for 715% damage, 10 times.
1 holy light is prepared every 11 sec, and you can hold up to 5 at a time.
Damage taken while the key is held, including attacks that deal damage in proportion to Max HP: -50%
Cooldown: 1.5 sec.
fifthMain.desc: While held, rain down angelic arrows from above
details: While held, reduces damage taken including %Max HP attacks, you will not be knocked back at all (Super Knockback Resistance), and prevents Critical Abnormal Statuses
This skill uses a special resource called Holy Light which are prepared every 11 seconds (Max. 5)<bp_Costs 1 Holy Light per second to cast_>

fifthBoost.name: Heal/Angelic Wrath Boost
details: [Lv. 20]: Max Targets: +1
[Lv. 40]: Ignore DEF: +20%

fifthBoost.name: Holy Arrow Boost
details: [Lv. 20]: Max Targets: +1
[Lv. 40]: Ignore DEF: +20%

fifthBoost.name: Shining Ray Boost
details: [Lv. 20]: Max Targets: +1
[Lv. 40]: Ignore DEF: +20%

fifthBoost.name: Big Bang Boost
details: [Lv. 20]: Max Targets: +1
[Lv. 40]: Ignore DEF: +20%

fifthBoost.name: Bahamut Boost Boost
details: [Lv. 20]: Max Targets: +1
[Lv. 40]: Ignore DEF: +20%

fifthBoost.name: Angel Ray Boost
details: [Lv. 20]: Critical Rate: +5%
[Lv. 40]: Ignore DEF: +20%

fifthBoost.name: Genesis/Triumph Feather Boost
details: [Lv. 20]: Critical Rate: +5%
[Lv. 40]: Ignore DEF: +20%

fifthBoost.name: Heaven's Door/Fountain of Vengeance Boost
fifthBoost.shortDesc: Heaven's Door/Fountain of Vengeance Final Damage: +120%
details: [Lv. 20]: Critical Rate: +5%
[Lv. 40]: Ignore DEF: +20%

masteryCore.name: 1st Mastery Node
details: Requires <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bishop/angel-ray.png} tip={Angel Ray (4th Job)}> enhanced with V Matrix at least Lv. 40 (before Matrix Points) to unlock

masteryCore.name: HEXA Angel Ray
masteryCore.shortDesc: MP Cost: 70, Max Enemies Hit: 4, Damage: 355%, Number of Attacks: 14, HP Recovery: 10% of Max HP of party members including yourself\nWhen the holy sword hits 12 times, the angel of judgment appears to unleash an additional attack.\nAngel of Judgment - Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 820%, Number of Attacks: 10
details: Unlocked with 1st Mastery Node

masteryCore.name: 2nd Mastery Node
details: Requires <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bishop/big-bang.png} tip={Big Bang (4th Job)}/> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bishop/genesis.png} tip={Genesis/Triumph Feather (4th/3rd Job)}> enhanced with V Matrix at least Lv. 40 (before Matrix Points) to unlock

masteryCore.name: HEXA Big Bang
masteryCore.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 115, Max Enemies Hit: 10, Damage: 820%, Number of Attacks: 4
Holy Explosion: MP Cost: 125, Max Enemies Hit: 12, Damage: 715%, Number of Attacks: 6
Cooldown: 6 sec
Big Bang and Holy Explosion Normal Enemy Damage: +50%
details: Unlocked with 2nd Mastery Node

masteryCore.name: HEXA Triumph Feather
masteryCore.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 110, Duration: 180 sec
Upon striking an enemy with an attack skill, creates 6 angel feathers every 4 sec that seek enemies and deal 570% damage 4 times.
Each subsequent feather to hit the same enemy deals 50% less Final Damage.
Angel Feather Cooldown: 3 sec
Cooldown: 60 sec
details: Unlocked with 2nd Mastery Node

masteryCore.name: 3rd Mastery Node
details: Requires <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bishop/heal.png} tip={Heal/Angelic Wrath (2nd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bishop/heavens-door.png} tip={Heaven's Door/Fountain of Vengeance (Hyper Skill/3rd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bishop/bahamut.png} tip={Bahamut (4th Job)}> enhanced with V Matrix at least Lv. 40 (before Matrix Points) to unlock

masteryCore.name: HEXA Angelic Wrath
masteryCore.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 27, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Damage: 450%, Number of Attacks: 7.
Enemies struck have their Defense reduced by 44% for 60 sec.
A relic is created in the spot attacked by the angel
Relic - Duration: 90 sec, Max Enemies Hit: 10, Duration of Debuff Equal of Angelic Wrath: 10 sec, does not stack with Angelic Wrath debuff
details: Unlocked with 3rd Mastery Node

masteryCore.name: HEXA Fountain of Vengeance
masteryCore.shortDesc: MP Cost: 45, Duration: 60 sec.\nPeriodically deals 310% damage 5 times to up to 8 enemies.
details: Unlocked with 3rd Mastery Node

masteryCore.name: HEXA Bahamut
masteryCore.shortDesc: MP Cost: 135, Bahamut Summon Duration: 270 sec.\nDamage: 372%, Number of Attacks: 3, Max Enemies Hit: 5\n[Passive Effect: HEXA Angel Ray Damage: +20% points, HEXA Angel Ray Angel of Judgment Damage: +35% points, Required Holy Sword Hit Count to Activate HEXA Angel Ray Angel of Judgment -4]
details: Unlocked with 3rd Mastery Node

masteryCore.name: 4th Mastery Node
details: Requires <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bishop/genesis.png} tip={Genesis/Triumph Feather (4th/3rd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bishop/heavens-door.png} tip={Heaven's Door/Fountain of Vengeance (Hyper Skill/3rd Job)}> enhanced with V Matrix at least Lv. 40 (before Matrix Points) to unlock

masteryCore.name: HEXA Genesis
masteryCore.shortDesc: MP Cost: 330, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 825%, Number of Attacks: 10, Critical Rate: +20%\nCooldown: 30 sec.\n[Passive Effect: [Final Attack] Your direct attack skills can activate Angel's Punishment that has a 65% chance to deal 405% damage.]
details: Unlocked with 4th Mastery Node

masteryCore.name: HEXA Heaven's Door
masteryCore.shortDesc: MP Cost: 560, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 805%, Number of Attacks: 10, Grants a buff that protects party members from KO once.\nCooldown: 60 sec\nParty members that receive Heaven's Door cannot receive it again for 600 sec.
details: Unlocked with 4th Mastery Node

skillCore.name: Holy Advent
skillCore.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1500, invincible during casting
Archangels descend, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 570%, Number of Attacks: 8, Number of Chase Cuts: 25. Damage: 475%, Number of Attacks: 12, Number of Chase Cuts: 35
Duration: 60 sec, Final Damage: +5%, manifests the Avenging Archangel, Archangel of Balance, and Archangel of Benevolence
Max Enemies Hit: 12, Advent Cooldown: 3 sec
Archangel of Balance - Damage: 515%, Number of Attacks: 14, every 3 sec
Avenging Archangel - Damage: 500%, Number of Attacks: 12, every 5 sec
Archangel of Benevolence - Damage: 600%, Number of Attacks: 12, every 4 sec
Cooldown: 360 sec

skillCore.name: Commandment of Heaven
skillCore.shortDesc: MP Cost: 1000, Invincible during casting\nThe angel of compassion and vengeance shines 14 times, dealing 7840% damage to up to 15 enemies 12 times. Then the Angel's Judgment is pronounced 13 times, dealing 10150% damage 15 times.\nIgnore Defense: +60%, Boss Damage: +40%, Critical Rate: 100%

boostCore.name: Benediction Boost
boostCore.shortDesc: Additionally increases Bishop's Final Damage by 17% when using Benediction, other Final Damage increase effects due to Benediction are addictive\n[Passive Effect - All Stats: +90]

meta: Bishop is an INT mage class part of the Explorers. Bishop utilize both Staves and Wands as their primary weapons. For their secondary weapon, Bishop can equip Magic Books and Shields
